summary.span: Contains a set of objects.

span.span: Contains a set of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `profile`組態檔區段會指定使用者設定檔的結構描述。The `profile` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在執行階段，ASP.NET 編譯系統會使用指定的資訊`profile`區段，以產生類別，稱為`ProfileCommon`，其衍生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`類別定義根據中定義的屬性`properties`小節的`profile`組態檔區段。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 每個使用者設定檔，建立這個類別的執行個體，您可以透過程式碼中存取個別的設定檔值屬性。An instance of this class is created for each user profile, and you can access the individual profile values in your code through the property. 如需有關設定檔屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 設定檔功能的詳細資訊加入至[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]，請參閱[ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the profile features added to [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，這是執行個體的類別。The following code example shows how to use the property, which is an instance of the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/CS/profilesection.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/VB/profilesection.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會插入`clear`插入適當的區段，以清除所有較高層級的組態檔中定義的項目參考的組態檔的指示詞。This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to clear all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file. 會移除目前的設定檔的適當區段中定義的所有項目。All elements defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file are removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
